DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation safety profile tolerability MabThera ( rituximab ) combination chemotherapy ( fludarabine cyclophosphamide ) treatment Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL ) .
DOC.brief_title: Rituximab Combination With Fludarabine Cyclophosphamide Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
DOC.criteria: Patients older 18 year diagnose Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL ) CLL stage : Binet stage C ( Rai III IV ) , Binet stage B ( Rai I II ) require treatment Patients eligible rituximab treatment accord Summary Product Characteristics ( SmPC )
